plot outline: Vidya, a young school girl, moves to a village from a city, where she becomes extremely friendly with a group of nine kids, who are naughty and adventurous alike. Soon, the school going children find themselves in a troubling situation which they surpass it, using their own special skill.
title: Eleyaru Naavu Geleyaru
plot: Vidya, a young school girl, moves to a village from a city, where she becomes extremely friendly with a group of nine kids, who are naughty and adventurous alike. Soon, the school going children find themselves in a troubling situation which they surpass it, using their own special skill.::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
